metadata.name: Create AI Tech Trend Feed
metadata.description: Create a new feed using the ai-tech-trend template in Daigest

params.text: (async () => { for(let i=0; i<50; i++) { const btn=[...document.querySelectorAll('button')].find(b=>b.textContent.includes('Use template')); if(btn) { btn.click(); return 'clicked'; } await new Promise(r=>setTimeout(r,100)); } return 'timeout'; })()

steps.description: Wait for and click 'Use template' button
